pullrequest.title: Fix compilation of tests using Joint base class

content.raw:
It worked on my quantal desktop and my mac. Thanks for catching this. I originally used `const char *`, but I switched to `std::string` because it made the xml test_result output a little cleaner. It looks like we should switch back though.

Do you know what version of gcc and OS the Jenkins master is using?
content.html:
It worked on my quantal desktop and my mac. Thanks for catching this. I originally used const char *, but I switched to std::string because it made the xml test_result output a little cleaner. It looks like we should switch back though.

Do you know what version of gcc and OS the Jenkins master is using?
